p: TPC was determined as described by Sicari et al. [ 20]. An aliquot of 350 Î¼L of aqueous extract was mixed with Folin-Ciocalteu reagent (1 mL) and 20% Na 2CO 3 solution (10 mL). The absorbance was measured at 760 nm in a spectrophotometer (UV-VIS-Agilent 8453) and the results were expressed in mg of gallic acid equivalent (GAE)/100 g fresh weight (FW).
